front.title: Neighbor Discovery and Address Autoconfiguration in Per-MS Subnet Prefix Model

abstract.t: This draft defines neighbor discovery and stateless addressautoconfiguration based on IEEE 802.16d/e per-MS subnet prefix model.In this model, an MS can have multiple IPv6 addresses, but an IPv6prefix can only be used by one MS, that is, different MSs cannotshare the same prefix.
